name: The Legendary Assassin KAL
description:
Play as a the Legendary Assassin 'KAL' in ancient China to save the Prophet


A stealth and action game involves you hiding from enemies line of sight and quietly assassinate them in the shadows. Involves climbing and jumping to move forward in each level.

Features:
- 20 levels
- Different skins varieties for hero and dagger
- Assassinate all of your enemies in style
- Collect all coins and jades scattered around the level for unlockables
- Beautiful low-poly environments
developers: KOEX studio - games by Choo Bin Yong
